temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: When sticks are centered the vehicle will stop rotating, but remain in its current orientation (not necessarily level) and moving according to its current momentum.

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Position of RC stick maps to the rate of rotation of vehicle in that orientation.

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The roll, pitch and yaw sticks control the rate of angular rotation around the respective axes and throttle is passed directly to control allocation.

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: When sticks are centered the vehicle will stop rotating, but remain in its current orientation (on its side, inverted, or whatever) and moving according to its current momentum.

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: RC Roll/Pitch/Yaw (RPY) stick inputs control the rate of angular rotation around the respective axes.
Throttle is passed directly to control allocation.
RC input is sent directly to control allocation.
